about.title: About Al-Amal
about.description: Al-Amal Academy is dedicated to providing authentic Islamic education in Quran, Arabic, and Tajweed. We connect students worldwide with qualified scholars who graduated from prestigious Islamic universities.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: Our mission is to make Islamic education accessible to Muslims worldwide. We strive to preserve the authentic teachings of Quran and Arabic language through qualified instructors and modern technology.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.description: We envision a global community of Quran learners who understand and practice the teachings of Islam. Our goal is to create a platform that makes learning Quran and Arabic accessible to everyone, anywhere.
